compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (a) your Contributions do not contain confidential or proprietary information;

By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (c) Faraday shall be entitled to use or disclose (or choose not to use or disclose) such Contributions for any purpose, in any way, in any media worldwide;

non_compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (b) Faraday is not under any obligation of confidentiality, express or implied, with respect to the Contributions;
non_compliant.amend: Faraday should implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of user contributions.

non_compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (e) your Contributions automatically become the property of Faraday without any obligation of Faraday to you;
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"), Right to Data Portability
non_compliant.amend: Users should retain control over their data and have the right to request deletion or transfer of their contributions.

non_compliant.section: By submitting ideas, suggestions, documents, and/or proposals ("Contributions") to Faraday through Website, you acknowledge and agree that: (f) you are not entitled to any compensation or reimbursement of any kind from Faraday under any circumstances.
non_compliant.amend: Users may have the right to compensation for material or non-material damages resulting from GDPR violations.
